Name: Lemon Butter Cookie
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An appropriate name for a most unusually flavoured cocktail modelled on the Polish Martini .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Mark 'Q-Ball' Linnie and Martin Oliver at the Mixing Tin bar in Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Lemon Butter Cookie contains 177 calories
